entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is introduced as someone who needs to be stopped by Harry. He is described as a person that Harry interacts with.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and is described as someone who sees the unicorn's beauty and sadness.

entities.name: unicorn
entities.description: The unicorn is introduced as a beautiful but dead creature. It is described in detail with its long slender legs and mane.

relationships.description: Harry stops Malfoy from doing something, although the text does not specify what action Malfoy was taking. This is inferred from Harry's action of holding out his arm to stop him.
